list.name: Default
list.comment: - Fixed proximity sensor bug on some devices.

task.summary: Default task
1. Fixed widget stuck when no default clock found. 2. Added an ability to sort by acceding time.
- Added new feature - clear notifications from the same together
- notification icon bg gets the opacity of the notification bg. - notification icon is now smaller and centered when icon itself is smaller.
- added some padding on normal/large notifications styles. - added option to keep only first/last events.
added ability to hide persistent notifications on some appearance presets
Added "Monitor Running Apps" feature.

1. monitor running apps has been changed to use window state changed event (battery friendly) 2. kill persistent notifications can be enabled independly. 3. Pin/ettings/Clear buttons are hidden when user didn't click the icon. (don't look good yet)
1. Changed look of action bar buttons. 2. Two-way synching with Floating Notifications
1. Replaced contact links with jira ones. 2. Center layout of action bar items.
1. added "monitor notifications bar" that clears notification after being cleared from android bar. 2. remove content when text is similiar to content.
again: 1. updated german translation 2. fixed a crash with the new monitor android bar feature.
1. Added new app specific settings - "Ignore empty notifications" 2. Large clock style has been moved down by 2dp.
v1.1.1: - Fixed a bug with monitor notifications - Initial support for nilsplus
- improved support for plugins (Floating notifications & NilsPlus) - now listen to remove_notification broadcast without need to have an active widget.
- added "resend_all_notifications" event, that notify again all of the current notifications to third-party services.
- added an ability to open notification by third-party apps
Fixed a bug in large notification style.
fixed content text on large notifications.
added spanish translation
Fixed crash on appearance startup

A complete refactor of the code - before adding the new 4.3 functionality: 1. Decouple notifications accessibility Service from the notifications service. (allow using other services as notification providers) 2. Removed unused features (like "Keep foreground" and "Monitor Running Apps" and use defaults instead) 3. Fixed "Collect when locked" feature. 4. Alarm icon has been revert back to stock alarm icon. 5. Many more tweaks and fixes. The app looks exactly the same as it was before the refactor - but now I can add a support for Android 4.3 notification system.
Changed to api level 18 (Android 4.3) Changed version number to 1.1.3 (178)
new android 4.3 notifications api integrated. still need more testing...
version updated to 1.2alpha.
updated wizard to launch notifications settings when used with Android 4.3
changed notificationparser to use reflection remoteviews cannot be reapplied. (dirty hack for 4.3)
1. added support for persistent notifications on 4.3 2. filtered out "downloads" app. (caused crashes)
1. Fixed a crash when notification doesn't have an icon. 2. Rearrange settings screen, remove wizard and add "add widget" instructions.
1. returned back persistent notifications settings to main settings screen. 2. add proper descriptions for all main settings headers.
1. Added option to forcibly remove notification when it opened. 2. Added option to disable two-way syncing on android 4.3.
changed description on widget add help.
add proper description when using a device without lock Android 4.2 and above.
added tutorial images
updated spanish translation. support nils+ time on notifications.
improved support nils+ time on notifications.
fixed bug with nils+ resubmit all notifications.
fixed a crash when unlocking device and the service is not running
Fixed a bug with clearing notifications on Android 4.3. now a notification is unique only with packagename + id. updated german translation.
removed unused string in german translation
removed unused string in german translation
send to NiLS+ package name when clearing notification.
fixed widgetlocker clear on unlock
- Always collect notifications with WidgetLocker. - Add some null checks
- add "action" pending intent to extension api.
- added ping/alive to 3rd party extensions.
fixed support for nilsplus
support notification update
Fixed proximity sensor bug.
1. added app specific settings - always use app icon 2. send app actions to nilsplus
removed byte array stream conversion, use parcable instead.
- Max lines bug was fixed. - Max lines is now capable to be 9.
- Fixed some exceptions
- added new feature: treat all notifications from an app as persistent notifications
- fixed a bug with android less than 4.1
Removed rolly poly ad
fixed crash when actions is null, fixed screen on bug.
fixed crash when packagename is null on accessibility event
support golocker with nilsplus events
1. added ability to add app specific settings within the settings app. 2. initial support for uid for each notification. (will be used later)
support uid for NiLS+
added an option to hide notifications.
added an option to hide notifications. (bugfix)
added an option to set how long will the screen keep on after a notification.
fixed a crash
1. Fixed action names sending to NiLS+ 2. Fixed flickering issue.
1. Quick enable/disable apps on app specific settings. 2. Show all of the apps that created notifications first and only load other apps when clicked.
added option to backup & restore settings
added option to backup & restore settings

1. Added new "Smart" notification sync - it will keep history of notifications and still sync it back to android notifications bar when cleared. 2. When using "Show first/last" on "Multiple Events Handling" with gmail the sender name is appears as the title of the notification instead of "2 new emails" (may work with other apps too)
added "smart" mode on other translations.
updated version code
fixed concurrent modifications exception. v1.2.8r2
fixed concurrent modifications exception. v1.2.8r3
1. improved battery consumption with proximity sensor enabled. 2. fixed concurrent modification crashes when notification opened from NiLS+
better integration with NiLS+ (NiLS Floating Panel)
Bug fixes: 1. Fixed a crash when opening persistent notifications settings.
1. removed NiLSPlus auto hide from accessibility service. 2. fixed delayed wake up.
1. Fixed covered/uncovered detection. 2. Fixed a crash when service is inactive.
1. Fixed another minor crash.
set notifications as default page on widget settings

1. Added new option to hide clock when a specific persistent notification aappear. 2. Bug fixes: - Delayed wake up. - Crash on reboot. - Crash when clicking "Floating Panel" - Crash on Widget appearance settings.
Added ability to switch off events sending to NiLS FP.
Fixed concurrent changes bug. Added Sony clock support.
- write to log file when service stops
1. Supports timely as clock app. 2. Show file name when backing up settings. 3. Added an option to disable title extraction from notification body. 4. Fixed some issues with clearing notifications.
1. Auto hide notifications list when NiLS FP is active. 2. Disable auto clock size when notifications list is hidden.
v1.3 Final changes before NiLS FP goes live.
v1.3 (2) Fixed a major crash when NiLS FP is installed.
v1.3.1: - fixed "clock is not updating" issue.
v1.3.1 (r2): - Fixed "loading" icon appears over and over.
v1.3.1 (r2): - Fixed "loading" icon appears over and over.
1. scale down icon size higher than 96dp. 2. added new option - "use status bar icon"
Make notifications listener lighter. move all of the logic into NotificationService. Old (<4.3) API is currently not working. need to fix.
Old API works again. need to check stability now.
1. Simplify Auto wake up settings. 2. Fix proximity sensor usage on notification update.
1. recycle cleared notifications (for better memory usage) 2. fixed changed flag on notification update.
v1.3.2 (beta2): Fixed some NullPointerExceptions
v1.3.2 (beta2): - Fixed some NullPointerExceptions - Added new "enable service" screen. (not active yet)
v1.3.2 (beta3): - Added bitmap caching and removing decodeResource calls. (should improve memory usage and stability)
v1.3.2 (beta3): - Added bitmap caching and removing decodeResource calls. (should improve memory usage and stability) - Disable LayoutInflate - caused a memory leak
v1.3.2 (beta4): - Changed NewNotificationsService not to work with broadcast, instead work with OnStartCommand. (should fix sync issue)

v1.3.2 (beta4): - Changed NewNotificationsService not to work with broadcast, instead work with OnStartCommand. (should fix sync issue) - Fixed NotificationService to be exported. - Completed new wizard and modified icons on settings.

v1.4 (alpha 1): - Simplified service settings: 1. Notification Mode: Grouped/Separated (instead of Multiple Events Handling) 2. Notification Icon: Large Icon, App Icon, or Monochrome Icon 3. Removed Notifications Bar Sync options - instead there are "Sync back notifications" and "Auto clear notifications" options.
- prevent change mode when persistent notifications options are displayed.
- merge duplicates. - added "deleted" flag to a notification item.
- fixed a crash when no big content available
- binding services instead of re-starting them. (better architecture) - fixed duplicated WhatsApp messages.
- added logical delete of notification (to remember not to show it again)
re-recreate app specific settings screen.
Changed to allow binding with NiLS FP service. this will help keeping NiLS FP service alive as long as NiLS is alive.
Fixed binding with NiLS FP - bind when bound to accessibility / notifications service.
- Fixed timeout to be seconds. - Keep old notification time if it hadn't changed
- Fixed to keep screen on when already turned on by previous notification. - Support "screen off & lock" app for turning screen off.
- Fixed alignment of "widget mode" spinner to be tighten to fit landscape mode.
- Support app specific "turn on screen" options.
bugfix: do not turn screen of if device is locked.
new feature: initial support for icon packs. (not ready yet)
new feature: completed support for icon packs.
bugfix: support icon packs with appfilter.xml as asset. fixed mask.
bugfix: returned the generated bitmap cache back.
bugfix: use BitmapCache class instead of local cache.
added what's new dialog.
fixed a crash when no icon pack was selected
fixed proximity sensor bug (hopefully) fixed icon to not scale up on icon packs changed turn on mode strings
- fixed a crash on accessibility service. - fixed a bug in icon position when small (with icon packs)
- fixed a crash very rarely. - accessibility service is now ignored on Android 4.3
- fixed a string with "
- nils fp service is now rebound when disconnected. - improved parsing - Textra sms and Whatsapp grouped messages
Fixed Textra multiple events
updated version number
load settings from NiLS FP.
widget settings screen is now functional. still need to fix persistent notifications settings.
implemented persistent notifications in widget settings.
implemented persistent notifications settings activity with card layout
implemented app specific settings with card layout sort app specific settings by visibility + title
Completed new UI. (added save/restore, contact us and about).
Import settings and license from NiLS FP (NiLS Unlocker)
added welcome screen and tutorial. (not ready yet)
Tutorial completed.
extract some strings into strings.xml
some refactoring
1. new option - notification privacy. 2. fixed app specific settings.
1. new option - notification privacy. 2. fixed app specific settings.
try to fix whatsapp duplicates bug. (unverified yet)
setting device timeout to turn off the screen after receiving a notification.
- Fixed proximity sensor bug on some devices.
